title: Ghore Pherar Gaan
overview: Tora, a music enthusiast, shifts to London after her marriage. She finds it hard to grapple with the high-society lifestyle thrust upon her by her mother-in-law, while she desperately tries to impress her cold and distant husband, Ribhu. A chance meeting with a talented Indian musician, Imran, turns her life around and the two are drawn to each other by their shared passion for country music and a tattered bond with their respective motherlands.
